tasks.description: Investigate and patch intermittent payment retry failures observed in production

tasks.description: Implement responsive image sizes and lazy-loading to improve page performance

tasks.title: Cleanup unused CSS
tasks.description: Remove deprecated CSS rules and reduce stylesheet size

tasks.title: Backup database
tasks.description: Create an automated daily backup task and verify restore process

tasks.title: practice web development
tasks.description:
This task involves hands-on practice with web development skills, including designing, building, and testing web applications or websites. The goal is to strengthen understanding of front-end technologies (like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as Angular, React, or Vue) and back-end concepts (such as REST APIs, databases, and server-side logic). It may also include experimenting with responsive design, debugging, and deploying small projects to gain practical experience.

Optional Additions:

Create small projects or components to reinforce learning.

Implement features such as forms, login pages, or data display.

Practice integrating APIs or connecting to a mock backend (like JSON-server).
